All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AfterLoginScreen
 
BarcelonaPlacesController
A class which inherits from PlacesController class and handles the chosen places in Barcelona by a customer and sets it into the array list of place preferences which is an attribute of Customer.
Boot
Boot class for booting the application.
Customer
Customer class that inherits from the User superclass and has its own preferences which are of CustomerPreferences class (aggregation).
CustomerPreferences
A class to handle all preferences from the customer for his trip.
Local
Local class that inherits from the User superclass and has some of its own attributes to store even more info about the local.
LocalOrderController
A class for handling the order interaction from the local's side.
MadridPlacesController
A class which inherits from PlacesController class and handles the chosen places in Madrid by a customer and sets it into the array list of place preferences which is an attribute of Customer.
Main
Main class that launches the app to main page.
Order
Class which has all the attributes needed for order creation and also methods to save order into SQLite database.
OrderController
A class for handling the order interaction from customer's side.
OrderExceptions
Order exceptions class which extends the built-in Java Exception class and handles the exceptions which are each a static inner class during the order creation.
OrderExceptions.BlankFieldsExceptionOrder
 
OrderExceptions.InvalidNumberInput
 
OrderExceptions.NoLocationChosen
 
OrderManager
A class which uses Singleton design pattern and provides the ability to work with one order object throughout the whole order creation even in different controllers.
Place
A place class that handles the JSON database where places for each city are stored.
PlaceDeserializer
A deserializer for the Place class that implements the JsonDeserializer interface provided by the Gson library.
PlacesController
A superclass which has the methods essential for displaying the places in each location.
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions
Registration and login exceptions class which extends the built-in Java Exception class and handles the exceptions which are each a static inner class during the registration and login process.
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions.BlankFieldsExceptionLogin
 
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions.BlankFieldsExceptionReg
 
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions.BlankFieldsExceptionRegLocal
 
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions.InvalidLogin
 
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions.InvalidNumberInput
 
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions.NoChoiceExceptionReg
 
RegistrationAndLoginExceptions.UsernameTakenException
 
RegistrationController
Class which handles the registration and login in the GUI.
TripSummaryController
Controller which handles the trip summary scene where all the information about created trip are shown to the user and they can accept it or reject it.
User
The User superclass that classes Customer and Local inherit from.
UserManager<T extends User>
A generic class called using Singleton design pattern that provides access to the current user object of type T which extends the User class.
ValenciaPlacesController
A class which inherits from PlacesController class and handles the chosen places in Valencia by a customer and sets it into the array list of place preferences which is an attribute of Customer.
